availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, saddler and sheriff. Kentucky native. Saddler in McLean County in 1860. Sheriff of the McLean County Court in 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoon, p. 4. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865); RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), NAI: 4213514, Archive Volume 2, p. 27, Kentucky, McLean County, July 25, 1863.
